Subject: Republic of North Macedonia
Description: The country is about to open accession negotiations with the European Union.

Subject: European Union
Description: Together, they aim for European Union accession, sustainable economic growth, and inclusive prosperity.

Subject: Innovation Hub
Description: UNDP will scale up programme innovations, including the Skopje Lab, the Innovation Hub, and platforms for disaster risk management and small and medium-sized enterprises.

Subject: North Macedonia
Description: North Macedonia is working towards narrowing the income gap with the European Union.

Subject: Sustainable Development Cooperation Framework Joint Steering Committee
Description: UNDP will participate in Government-United Nations coordination mechanisms, including the Sustainable Development Cooperation Framework Joint Steering Committee.
